mapper.update:
update quality_pro_pre
pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pre_content = #{preContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pre_file = #{preFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_last_modified = #{gmtLastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where pre_id = #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update quality_pro_pre set pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pre_content = #{preContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_file = #{preFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_last_modified = #{gmtLastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where pre_id = #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT qpm.pro_id,qpm.build_id,qpm.pro_name,qpm.pre_status, so.name as build_name, qpp.pre_id FROM quality_pro_management as qpm INNER JOIN sys_org as so ON qpm.build_id = so.org_id LEFT JOIN quality_pro_pre AS qpp ON qpm.pro_id = qpp.pro_id
so.org_id = #{buildId}
